name: Trial By Fireball
description:
A social deduction game in the same vein as games like Among Us, Project Winter, Werewolf, Town of Salem and TTT. Loyal wizards must determine who among them is traitorous and vote them out in trial. The twist is that the trials occur on a regular basis and if players don't show up to the trial, it goes on without them. Loyal wizards must also aim to complete tasks vital to the upkeep of the mansion. Traitorous wizards must secretly pick off the loyal wizards one by one until none remain.

Ideally played in a group of 5-8 (current versions allow for 2-8 players for testing purposes).

To host : Click 'host' on the main menu. Ensure you have port 25565 (TCP) forwarded on your router (this is the same port as Minecraft, if you have a port forward set up for that it should work). 

To join : Click 'join' on the main menu. Enter the host's IP address and you will join their lobby.
